topic.title: Installing Multiple Instances of WAR Distribution on a Tomcat Web Server

body.p:
For organizations that have multiple sets of licenses (for example, an integrator with multiple clients might host a different license server for each client), use this procedure to install multiple instances of the Oxygen License Servlet on a Tomcat web server:
Rename the license server WAR file according to your needs. For example, you could use the customer name and a number (e.g. client23415).
Go to your Tomcat license server manager (e.g. http://my.tomcatserver.com:port/manager/ ) and enter your credentials.
Scroll to WAR file to deploy and press Browse button.
Locate the WAR file from step 1 and press the Open button.
Press the Deploy button.
Check that the newly deployed license server is running (it must be in the Applications table).
